getAllBuskers: SELECT user.user_id, user.type_id, user.username, user.`password`, busker.nick_name, busker.sex, busker.date_of_birth, busker.instruments, busker.introduction FROM `user`, busker WHERE user.user_id = busker.busker_id;
getBuskerById: SELECT user.user_id, user.type_id, user.username, user.`password`, busker.nick_name, busker.sex, busker.date_of_birth, busker.instruments, busker.introduction FROM `user`, busker WHERE user.user_id = busker.busker_id and busker.busker_id =
getBuskerDetails:
SELECT DISTINCT `user`.user_id, image.path, busker.nick_name, busker.sex, busker.date_of_birth, busker.instruments, busker.introduction 
FROM (`user`, image)
LEFT JOIN `busker`
ON (busker.busker_id= `user`.user_id) 
WHERE image.image_id = `user`.icon_path AND user_id =
getTrailId: SELECT trail_id from trail_notice WHERE busker_id =
getMomentsId: SELECT moment_id from moments WHERE busker_id =
getRecentPerformDate: SELECT busker_id , MAX(post_time) as recentPerform FROM moments GROUP BY busker_id;
getTendencyValue: SELECT busker_id , SUM(tendency) as tendencyAllHot FROM moments GROUP BY busker_id;
getPerformanceList: SELECT moments.moment_id, moments.post_time,nick_name, moments.address, moments.content , moments.tendency FROM moments, busker WHERE moments.busker_id = busker.busker_id;
getMomentsByBuskerId: SELECT moments.moment_id, moments.post_time,nick_name, moments.address, moments.content , moments.tendency FROM moments, busker WHERE moments.busker_id = busker.busker_id AND busker.busker_id =
getPoster: SELECT moments.moment_id,image.image_id, image.path FROM moments, image,moment_image WHERE moment_image.image_id = image.image_id AND moment_image.moment_id = moments.moment_id;
getPerformanceDetail: SELECT moments.moment_id, moments.post_time,nick_name, moments.address, moments.content , moments.tendency FROM moments, busker WHERE moments.busker_id = busker.busker_id and moment_id =
getPerformancePoster: SELECT moments.moment_id, image.path ,image.image_id FROM moments, image,moment_image WHERE moment_image.image_id = image.image_id AND moment_image.moment_id = moments.moment_id AND moments.moment_id =
getVideoUrl: SELECT moments.busker_id, moments.moment_id,video_url.video_id, video_url.url FROM moments, video_url WHERE moments.moment_id = video_url.moment_id;
getVideoUrlByPerformanceId: SELECT moments.busker_id, moments.moment_id, video_url.url,video_url.video_id FROM moments, video_url WHERE moments.moment_id = video_url.moment_id AND  moments.moment_id =
getTrailById: SELECT trail_notice.trail_id, trail_notice.perform_time, trail_notice.participant, trail_notice.perform_address,trail_notice.describe, image.path FROM trail_notice, image WHERE trail_notice.poster = image.image_id AND trail_notice.trail_id=
getUserByUsername:
SELECT `user`.user_id, `user`.type_id, image.path, `user`.`password` FROM `user`, image
WHERE `user`.username = ? AND image.image_id = `user`.icon_path;
getTrailsByBuskerId:
SELECT trail_notice.trail_id, trail_notice.perform_time, trail_notice.participant, trail_notice.perform_address,trail_notice.describe, image.path
FROM trail_notice, image
WHERE trail_notice.poster = image.image_id and busker_id =
getImageIdByPath: SELECT image.image_id FROM image WHERE image.path = ?;
addBusker: INSERT busker(busker.busker_id, busker.nick_name, busker.date_of_birth, busker.instruments, busker.introduction,busker.sex, busker.`status`) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
updateBusker: UPDATE busker SET busker.nick_name = ?, busker.date_of_birth = ?, busker.instruments = ?,busker.introduction = ? ,busker.sex = ? ,busker.`status` = ? WHERE busker.busker_id = ?;
addMoment: INSERT moments(moments.busker_id, moments.post_time, moments.content, moments.`status`, moments.tendency,moments.address) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?);
getMomentIdByPostTime: SELECT moments.moment_id FROM moments WHERE post_time = ?;
